product_name: Michael Todd BeautySoniclear Patented Antimicrobial Sonic Cleansing Brush
summary: SummaryMichael Todd Beauty Soniclear Antimicrobial Sonic Skin Cleansing Brush is a 3-in-1 Beauty Device for skin cleansing, firming massage & serum infusion. Soniclear provides cleaner, smoother, and brighter skin and reduces the appearance of pore size.
details: DetailsBenefits2024 ALLURE'S BEST OF BEAUTY & 2024 ALLURE'S READER'S CHOICEPatented Antimicrobial "Clean & Fresh" brush protection reduces bacteria formation that can grow on brush heads between use by 99.9%Cleanses 7x's better than hands aloneAllows you to cleanse hard-to-reach places like the T-zone areaPrevents Clogged Pores by sonically removing dirt, oil and makeup with 3 customizable speed settingsAutomatic timer beeps every 20 seconds to alert you when to move to the next area to standardize your cleansing experienceRechargeable; max running battery time of more than 2 hours and 100% waterproof and submersibleDermatologist recommendedSafe for all skin types/tonesResearch ResultsAfter 14 days of daily use:100% of participants reported cleaner, softer, healthier-looking skin**100% of participants reported brighter and more youthful appearing skin with reduced dry patches**100% of the participants said they would recommend the Soniclear to a friend**90% of participants reported a reduction and improvement in pore congestion**87% of participants reported an improvement in the look of skin firmness and elasticity**69% of participants reported a reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles***Independent Laboratory Testing found Soniclear cleansing brushes with Life Antimicrobial Protection to be five times more effective than silicone brushes against microbial contamination**Based on a 20-participant home perception study to evaluate the effectiveness of the Soniclear cleansing system when added to participants' daily skincare routineIncludesSoniclear Cleansing ToolAntimicrobial Face Brush Head (all skin types)Firming Massage Treatment/Serum Infusion HeadHard-Shell Travel CaseWireless Charging/Drying StandUSB CordItem 2534808How To UseApply 2 pumps of facial cleanser into hands or onto the Soniclear. Begin working the product into wet skin of the face and neck using upward circular motions. Rinse with lukewarm water and pat dry with a clean towel.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply 2 pumps of facial cleanser into hands or onto the Soniclear. Begin working the product into wet skin of the face and neck using upward circular motions. Rinse with lukewarm water and pat dry with a clean towel.

reviews.headline: Battery doesn't stay charged
reviews.comments: Battery dies after one use . I've only had it one year and the last one i bought lasted me 7 years . This time I'm very disappointed .

reviews.headline: Perfect replacement for brush - previous review had an error
reviews.comments: I have been looking for this replacement for my Clarisonic facial brush cleaner. The Clarisonic product is no longer available. I was pleased that this replacement model fit my brush which saved me money from having to buy an entire new kit.

reviews.headline: Perfect replacement for brush
reviews.comments: I have been looking for this replacement for my Clarisonic facial brush cleaner. The Clarisonic product is no longer available. I was pleased that this replacement model fit my brush which saved me money from having to buy an entire new kit.

reviews.headline: not this particular one
reviews.comments:
I just purchased my 3rd since they came out on the market yrs ago. This one is prettier, so I replaced my perfectly good one for it's looks.  
However, this cute thing is possessed. It just randomly starts up and vibrates every 30 minutes out of nowhere until it dies.  I've had to take it to the garage in the middle of the night several times. 
So yes, I will buy another one, but was very disappointed in this one.

reviews.headline: Stopped working after 5 months
reviews.comments: I used it once daily with Tula cleanser. It did nothing to improve my skin texture. Also stopped working after 5 months.

reviews.headline: Stopped working after 5 months
reviews.comments: I used it once daily with Tula cleanser. It did nothing to improve my skin texture. Also stopped working after 5 months.

reviews.headline: Avoid!
reviews.comments: Purchased for my daughter to replace her decade old Clarisonic that finally failed. This one wouldn't charge out of the box. We tried different USB plugs and regular plugs with different adapters and nothing worked. She reached out to Michael Todd Beauty (only email, no phone number ðŸš©) and only received an auto reply and nothing further. After looking further into reviews she filed a complaint with the BBB. Thankfully ULTA was amazing and allowed me to return it as it was within the holiday return window even though she had discarded the box on Christmas morning (had all the components and paperwork, just not the box). The 1 start is for the non-working appliance manufacturer and no correlation to ULTA.

reviews.headline: Reordered
reviews.comments: Was excited to get this as my Clairesonic which was over 6 years old no longer had brushes available.  I Plugged the Soniclear in and it never charged.  After 3 days realized it wasn't happening so had to return it.  I did order another one and so far it is charging but haven't tried it yet.

reviews.headline: Mediocre. Not as good as Sonicare.
reviews.comments: My skin is not as clear, it doesn't alert you when the battery is running low so it constantly dies mid-use, and it has to be charged every 5 days compared to every 2 weeks with my Sonicare. It's an inferior product across the board.

reviews.headline: Love this Brush!!
reviews.comments: This brush is amazing!! I admit I was a bit skeptical because I have tried a multitude of face scrubbing brushes for my face to incorporate into my skincare routine, but haven't found one that works as well as this brush!! It isn't harsh on my skin and it truly works wonders!! If you're looking for a sonic brush for your face that is gentle and truly works, then look no further!! I recommend it wholeheartedly!!

reviews.headline: I am obsessed with how this makes my skin feel
reviews.comments: At first, I was a little wary about this brush, I was afraid that it would be too harsh on my skin, instead, it had sonic vibrations that left my skin feeling cleaner, removed every stitch of make up, without making my skin feel torn apart. I am obsessed with my skin feels

reviews.headline: I am obsessed with how this makes my skin feel
reviews.comments: At first, I was a little wary about this brush, I was afraid that it would be too harsh on my skin, instead, it had sonic vibrations that left my skin feeling cleaner, removed every stitch of make up, without making my skin feel torn apart. I am obsessed with my skin feels

reviews.headline: Hands down favorite
reviews.comments: I absolutely love my Sonicare Petite!! Ive been using mine for years, and YES they last that long! I love that they now come with a cradle charger instead of a magnetic one. The price is worth it because it comes with additional interchangeable heads and a card inaide the box for a free sensitive skin brush head. This cleansing brush will change your routine and skin forever. Its also waterproof! Use it in the shower with no worries.

reviews.headline: Makes my skin feel so good.
reviews.comments:
So usually when I remove makeup with my hands and wash my face afterwards and my skin doesn't always feel completely cleanâ€¦I always wake up with my skin feeling icky. 
When I tried this product to remove, it felt like I never even had makeup on before and my skin was so soft and felt great the following morning as well. I love it so much!

reviews.headline: So far so good.
reviews.comments: I've had this a little while but to be honest it got misplaced in my move so I haven't used it much. While I did use it seemed to do the trick. My skin felt clean and refreshed.

reviews.headline: Best cleansing brush
reviews.comments: A cleaning brush that gets the job done, removes the makeup instantly without leaving any behind. Has a soft brush which doesn't irritate skin, easy to take anywhere & the cleaning of tools is so easy

reviews.headline: The petite size is perfect for traveling
reviews.comments:
If you want cleaner, smoother, and healthier skin, this device is worth every penny. I can't recommend it enough. 

Here are some benefits:

It effectively removes makeup, dirt, and impurities, leaving my skin feeling incredibly clean.

The antimicrobial brush bristles provide gentle exfoliation, which has improved the texture of my skin.

The petite size is perfect for traveling, and I appreciate the convenience of a rechargeable battery.

reviews.headline: Super helpful
reviews.comments: The Soniclear Petite is very gentle on the skin while also exfoliating. I could see my skin getting clearer and brighter after continuous use.  The battery life also lasts long as well. I really enjoy using it.

reviews.headline: Amazing brush to cleanse
reviews.comments:
I've had so many compliments about my skin lately I have to share this product with you.
This cleansing brush is so effective yet so gentle that it does not irritate the skin if you use it two times a day.
The interchangeable heads are amazing and makes it easy to apply cleanser, serum, and moisturizer with one tool.
My skin texture has soften out and my pores look more refined.

reviews.headline: Easy to Use - Does the Trick
reviews.comments: I use Soniclear Petite to take off my makeup and cleanse my face. It's easy to use and does the job well. I'd definitely recommend.

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this product two weeks ago and I am utterly amazed at how clear my skin has gotten from a few uses. It works so well on dark skin tones like mine.
faceoff_positive.headline: Transformative!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I order a device back in May of 2020, then it stopped working in September, so I received my first replacement. THEN 5 MONTHS LATER my device completely wouldn't charge. I got ANOTHER replacement and I open the package just to find out they've sent me a device that literary will not charge. I CAN'T MAKE THIS UP! I've already been through THREE (yes, three) petite devices in specifically the rose gold color all of which stopped working/charging after a few months. This product is trash. I can honestly say I never even leave reviews, but I made sure I left one for this CRAPPY device. It's also important to note when I order this back in May of  2020 it was the ONLY color that didn't come with a charging stand/base which I thought was completely strange. Then A YEAR later the company decides to discontinue the original device I got in rose gold. NOW all of a sudden the company sells a new upgraded version a year later it with a charging stand/base and claims it was just for "aesthetics" purposes. My older sister has a soniclear elite that has been working for the last 4 YEARS, she only had to get one replacement that's lasted about another 4 YEARS. PLEASE SAVE YOUR TIME AND MONEY WITH THIS DEVICE!
faceoff_negative.headline: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERRIBLE
